answers.answer: The only thing you can really do to prepare is to make sure you make your hospital bag. What helped me a lot was packing some of my electronics. And if you like to read bring a book. They will probably have a tv but its hard to focus on it. I wad induced and it actually went very well and fast. May I ask what symptoms you havr from preeclampsia? Im worried I may be coming down with it. Like do you havr a lot of protein in your urine? Ehat is your blood pressure usually around?

I had protein yes but it was mainly from stress and quickly gained weight as well as dehydration constantly. It's not even something I knew I had. Having swollen legs and hands can be a sign but I never had it.
Did you have a large amount?  And h ow high was ur blood pressure

question: After many tests,  I will be induced on week 38 from pre eclampsia. I have to go in twice a week for a stress test till then. My question is, is there anything I can do to prepare for it? I'm 1cm and 75% effaced. i thought I was 36 weeks but apparently I'm 35. So I have three weeks. Any advice would help!!!
title: induced advice
